SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Stage

java.lang.Object
cycling.Stage
public class Stage extends Object
Stage stores information regarding a stage such as checkpoints and the properties associated with it

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Stage

      public Stage()
      An empty constructor used to make a temporarily empty stage

    • Stage

      public Stage(String name, String description, double length, LocalDateTime startTime, StageType type, int id, Race race)
      Creates a new stage with the provided parameters
      Parameters:
      name - The name of this stage
      description - The description of this stage
      length - The distance of this stage
      startTime - The time this stage begins
      type - The type of stage StageType.FLAT, StageType.MEDIUM_MOUNTAIN, StageType.HIGH_MOUNTAIN or StageType.TT
      id - The unique id of this stage
      race - The list of all races in CyclingPortalImpl

    • adjustTimes

      public Map<Integer,LocalTime> adjustTimes(int index)
      Adjusts the times of riders who finish within 1 second of each other to both have the adjusted time that was the fastest between the two
      Parameters:
      index - What position to begin sorting from
      Returns:
      The Map of riderIds and their newly adjusted times for this stage

      public void setState()
      Sets the current state of a stage to "waiting for results". Applies after this stage has finished being configured

    • getType

      public StageType getType()

      Returns:

    • addResults

      public void addResults(int id, LocalTime[] times)
      Adds the results of a stage for a specific rider
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id of the rider these times belongs to
      times - The array of times each checkpoint was passed inside this stage for that rider

    • getResults

      public LocalTime[] getResults(int id)
      Gets the results for a rider in a stage
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id of the rider whose results are being returned
      Returns:
      The array of times each checkpoint was passed inside this stage for the rider

    • addMountainCheckpoint

      public int addMountainCheckpoint(double location, CheckpointType type, double gradient, double length)
      Adds a new mountain checkpoint to a stage
      Parameters:
      location - Where in the stage this checkpoint is
      type - The category of the climb - CheckpointType.C4, CheckpointType.C3, CheckpointType.C2, CheckpointType.C1, or CheckpointType.HC
      gradient - The average gradient of the climb
      length - The length (in km) of the climb
      Returns:
      The unique id of the checkpoint created

    • addSprintCheckpoint

      public int addSprintCheckpoint(double location)
      Adds an intermediate sprint checkpoint to a stage
      Parameters:
      location - Where in the stage this checkpoint is
      Returns:
      The unique id of the checkpoint created

    • findCheckpointsStage

      public static Stage findCheckpointsStage(int checkpointId, Map<Integer,Race> races, ArrayList<Integer> stageIds)
      Finds the stage a checkpoint is in
      Parameters:
      checkpointId - The unique id of the checkpoint being referenced
      races - The list of races in CyclingPortalImpl
      stageIds - The list of all stage ids in CyclingPortalImpl
      Returns:
      The stage that the checkpoint that checkpointId belongs to is in

    • getRiderTimes

      public Map<Integer,LocalTime[]> getRiderTimes()
      Gets all of the times for every rider in a stage
      Returns:
      A map containing all of the rider ids and their times for this stage

    • getRiderPositions

      public ArrayList<Integer> getRiderPositions()
      Gets the finishing positions of every rider in a stage
      Returns:
      An ordered list of the rider ids corresponding to where they finished for this stage

      public Race getRace()
      Gets the race that a stage belongs to
